name: No way out?
description:
"No way out?" is less of a game and more of an experience or little story.

It only takes a couple of minutes to finish, so why not just give it a try? :)

If the end leaves you wondering, try this "guide": https://www.dropbox.com/s/crtbfmzfjt2x7sz/Hint.txt?dl=0

Controls are explained ingame, but in case you missed it:
Click to speed up and advance text
Mouse to look around
WASD or arrows to move
Space to jump

Created for Mini LD 58 (Theme: Pong)
